doc.name: MonitorReceiverAttribute
doc.description: This parameter, when inserted into a port, causes the port to display data available for the actor to read. It assumes that the port is an input port. Otherwise, it returns an empty string. It is a singleton, and it's name is always _showInfo, regardless of what name argument is specified to the constructor. Note that the display is not automatically updated. Use an instance of RepaintController in your model to cause the display to be updated, or use MonitorReceiverContents.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
